sources.title: The Very Edge
sources.description: Title: The Very Edge Summary: A young married woman finds herself being stalked by a sinister psychopath. Directed by: Cyril Frankel Actors: Richard Todd, Anne Heywood, Nicole Maurey Production Company: Raymond Stross Productions Release Date: 7 June 1963 (Ireland) Aspect Ratio: 2.35 : 1 A young married woman finds herself being stalked by a sinister psychopath.

metadata.Plot: A young married woman finds herself being stalked by a sinister psychopath.
metadata.Writer: Elizabeth Jane Howard, Vivian Cox, Leslie Bricusse
metadata.Actors: Richard Todd, Anne Heywood, Nicole Maurey
